column17: How could the industry reduce its impact on the environment ? (give one example)
Start using less amount of water
By reducing the usage of synthetic plastics in textile manufacturing, ex; using organically derived cotton rather than synthetic cotton blends
Focus more on quality produced rather than quantity
Market for less mass consumption, and find methods to sustainably produce fashion.
Mix between Just in Time and Just in Case Production Processes instead of only Just in Case which creates higher waste and uses more production materials.

put more regulations on fast fashion production so that the environment could be 
less subject to pollution and contamination, aw well as spreading awareness and encouraging slow fashion
to promote digitization of fashion brand shops to produce just in time vs just in case
Recycling materials to make new clothes
they can receive per-owned clothes from customers and either resell the pieces or re-use the fabric (levi's has something like this)
limit the amount of fast fashion production or to convince people to buy more sustainable products
Stop the mass production and move towards slower more customised and more sustainable production.
Inform people about the importance of sustainable clothing and the impact of clothes production on the environment.
keep promoting sustainable fashion even for the fast fashion brands
recycling the materials of old clothes and lowering the prices of sustainable clothes
using clothes donated by customers to produce new pieces
stop mass production and reduce producing trendy clothes every month - produce less collections in less quantities
lower the price to encourage consumption of sustainable stores
Force product sourcing to be ethical

Ask for a recovery of old close from customers to either donate them , by giving in exchange a reduction coupon . Or get them back them to fix them and resell them . This technique is the one used by apple for its iPhone

Products materials that don't affect the environment
awareness, so that companies change their methods to help the environment
implement mandatory sustainability for every clothing company

by implementing eco methodologies into production
